item.title: How to Grow Coriander/ Cilantro/ Dhania from Seeds
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hi friends in this video you will see how to grow coriander/cilantro/dhania from seeds. I will show you step-by-step plant growth updates from seed germination to seed harvest. Make sure...

The post How to Grow Coriander/ Cilantro/ Dhania from Seeds appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video you will see how to grow coriander/cilantro/dhania from seeds. I will show you step-by-step plant growth updates from seed germination to seed harvest. Make sure to watch the complete video.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 1:17 Split Seeds by Pressing It
  • 1:36 Place Seeds on a Cotton Cloth
  • 1:52 Evenly Space the Seeds
  • 2:07 Drench the Cloth with Water
  • 2:17 Wrap the Seeds within the cloth
  • 2:33 Place the cloth in indirect light
  • 2:58 After 13 Days
  • 3:04 Moisten Cloth
  • 3:31 Pot Size 10 CM X 15 CM X 15 CM
  • 3:39 Growing Medium 100% Kitchen Compost
  • 3:49 Space the Germinated Seeds 5 cm Apart
  • 4:18 Cover the Seeds and Gently Press
  • 4:45 Place seeds in 3 rows and 4 columns
  • 5:25 Thoroughly Water the Pot
  • 5:58 After 18 Days
  • 6:02 Plastic Container as Humidity Dome
  • 6:20 After 2 Months
  • 6:25 Leaves are Narrowing As Plant is Bolting
  • 6:37 High-Temperature Causing Early Bolting
  • 6:45 Coriander Flower Blooms
  • 7:20 After 2.5 Months
  • 7:27 Saving Coriander Seeds
  • 7:36 Several Clusters of Blooms
  • 7:49 Immature Seed Pods
  • 8:09 After 3 Months
  • 8:15 Several Green Seed Pods and Blooms
  • 8:38 Mature Seed Pod
  • 8:45 Harvesting of Coriander Seeds

Split Seeds by Pressing It


Put Seeds on a Cotton Cloth


Drench the Cloth with Water


Wrap the Seeds within the cloth


Place the cloth in indirect light


Seed Germination After 13 Days


Pot Size and Growing Medium


Sowing Germinated Coriander Seeds


Thoroughly Water the Pot


Young Seddlings After 18 Days


Mature Bolting Coriander Plant After 2 Months


Several Clusters of Blooms After 2.5 Months


Plant Loaded with Seed Pods After 3 Months


Harvesting of Coriander Seeds

I hope friends, you liked my journey of growing coriander/cilantro/dhaniya from seed. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post How to Grow Coriander/ Cilantro/ Dhania from Seeds appeared first on Plants My Love.

item.title: How to Grow Basil from Cutting Water Propagation
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Learn how to grow basil from cuttings using the water propagation method. This video covers 3 month’s worth of plant growth updates. If you like it share and subscribe to...

The post How to Grow Basil from Cutting Water Propagation appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Learn how to grow basil from cuttings using the water propagation method. This video covers 3 month’s worth of plant growth updates. If you like it share and subscribe to our youtube channel Plants My Love.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 00:51 Basil Plant Information
  • 2:21 Type and Length of Basil Cuttings
  • 3:59 Preparing Basil Cuttings
  • 5:39 Cutting Growing Container
  • 6:37 Sunlight, Temperature, and Time Required
  • 8:50 Cutting Update after 5 Days
  • 10:26 Cutting Update after 10 Days
  • 11:58 Basil Cutting Soil Transplant
  • 13:26 Basil Growth after 3 Month

I hope friends, you liked this video guide on How to Grow Basil from Cutting. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post How to Grow Basil from Cutting Water Propagation appeared first on Plants My Love.
